reviewText: Great classic movies with great stories and great acting. If you love old classic movies, I recommend this DVD for your collection.
I knew these were old movies and I've always liked Sidney Poitier. A patch of Blue is a movie I remembered from my childhood and now I can watch it anytime.

This is a nice set of some of Sidney Poitier film from WB and few MGM's which are owned by WB. Each movie has it's own disk and is in a spindle type holder in a 14mm DVD case. The audio for all DVDs are English mono and French mono and the subtitles vary from English, French and Spanish. The films included are as follows:

"The Blackboard Jungle" (1955/b&w/Widescreen/100mins)
Glenn Ford, Anne Francis, Louis Calhern, Margaret Hayes, Sidney Poitier; directed by Richard Brooks
"Edge of City" (1957/b&w/Widescreen/85mins)
John Cassavetes, Sidney Poitier, Jack Warden, Kathleen Maguire; directed by Martin Ritt
"Something of Value" (1957/color/Widescreen/114mins)
Rock Hudson, Dana Wynter, Sidney Poitier, Wendy Hiller; directed by Richard Brooks
"A Patch of Blue" (1965/b&w/Widescreen/105mins)
Sidney Poitier, Shelley Winters, Elizabeth Hartman; directed by Guy Green

Overall this is a great collection and is a product I would recommend.

This is a fantastic collection of films. Transfers are excellent and each movie is on its own disc. I got it for Blaackboard Jungle. The others were equally good. A true treasure indeed. I highly recommend this fine set.
I love almost every movie he has been in.  He is an outstanding actor and his movies are always well played.

A Patch of Blue is one of my all time favorite movies so I got this set for that movie alone but greatly enjoyed the others as well.

Sidney Poitier's versatility is superb.
Prompt delivery, good product, and reasonable price. I hadn't seen most of these before. Very enjoyable and thought provoking, interesting comparison to today.
love it
love every tape such a great actor
I LOVE the old classic movies.  Here are four of the best!  I am a fan of Sidney Poitier and two of these movies I haven't seen.  I look forward to viewing them over this summer break!
I bought this 4 pack movie collection shortly after I bought & watched In The Heat of the Night.
Great classics!

What a great collection of Sidney Poitier's films. My favorite was Blackboard Jungle. I had seen A Patch of Blue, but this was the first time I had seen Edge of the City and Something of Value. What a fine actor Mr Poitier is, one of my favorites. After purchasing In the Heat of the Night, I decided to add more of his films to my collection, including his film debut, No Way Out, and his Oscar winner, Lilies of the Field.
what can say i love sidney poitier
Some of Poitier's early films. Blue-collar racism of the 50's seems to be the theme in this collection of movies. Poitier shines through them all.

I was looking for SOMETHING OF VALUE when I came upon this set.  It is about $6 cheaper for 4 movies as SOV  was by itself.  Quality is great and ALL 4 movies are in WIDESCREEN.  They don't tell you that in the description.
always  great
great product great price
I enjoy Sidney Poitier.  I enjoyed this set very much.
Great collection of movies, bought it for my girlfriend from Kenya, she loved Something of Value as well as the others.
I am very happy with this product
Love the classics and absolutely love Sidney Poitier!!!This was a great find with 4 classics in one.
In my opinion, one of our greatest and time tested actors of all time.

I love it

On the order info, it said "color" and all the pictures are shown in color. I know TCM had done a colorized version of "A Patch of Blue". Thats what I thought I was getting. I was disappointed that 2 of the 4 that I have watched were black and white. I rated it "2" because it wasn't what it said it was but Sidney Poiter gets a "5" whether black and white or in color.
Content fine, DVD was purchased new, and was in fact new.
A nice selection of Sidney Poitier's early works.

Good combo and Sidney Poitier was a noble classic actor who is one of our favourites. "A Patch of Blue" I believe rivals "Guess who's coming to Dinner" in a fashion resembling the same racial issues of the time.
Great movies !!!!
Pleasant surprise!
What more can I say about Sidney. He's  the MAN
Great movie
fabulous

EDGE OF THE CITY & THE BLACKBOARD JUNGLE ARE GRITTY AND REALISTIC FILMS
THAT WERE RATHER THOUGHT PROVOKING FOR THEIR TIME AND ARE STILL GREAT
FAVORITES TO MY MIND.

THE OTHER TWO FILMS ARE AVERAGE... BUT ENTERTAINING...

THE SETS IS A GREAT VALUE.
gotta love Sidney
great movie

This is a great Sidney Poitier collection. So classic!! Every movie is fantastic and good quality. Honestly I couldn't beat the price either. A patch of blue was excellent and Edge of the City was great as well. If you are a fan of Sidney Poitier like I am you won't regret adding this bad boy to your collection.
ok
all 4 movies good, thank you.
Sidney is one of my favorite actors this is a good collection

I love all these movies featuring Sidney Poitier, especially A Patch of Blue, which is the reason I purchased this DVD set. A Patch of Blue is a wonderful story, very heartwarming. I've seen it many, many times and will continue to watch it.

These are classic films, so I will not bore anyone with my reviews of each. The quality was excellent. Each film is on a separate disc. Since I store my DVDs in binder sleeves, this means I only have 1 empty disc case to discard. Although there was a redundant cardboard sleeve, the case contined no loose junk-advertising inside.
Great - brand new and packaged/sealed upon delivery.

Watched them all and as always it was great to revisit these movies. Mr. Poitier is such a great actor, I only wish he had made more movies.

I usually like Sidney Poitier movies.  These were perhaps some of his little known ones.  Patch of Blue and Blackboard Jungle were the best in this collection.  I really was not impressed with the other two.
wanting to see sidney poitier in action if you've got the fever for him this is it if he is your favorite actor this D V D, has the actionand suspence you'd like.
Loved watching these old movies!  They have substance to them without sex and violence.  These movies were made before my time but I still enjoy watching them.  Arrived on time and well packaged.
I only liked a few of the movies--like Blackboard Jungle, but it was cheaper to order a 4 disk set than to get each movie separately.

I have only seen A Patch of Blue of this classic legend collection.  I will enjoy viewing them all and great to have in my library.  One thing I love about all of the Sidney Poitier movies that I have seen is that none of the stories are racially based.  They are a great subject matter and good quality material and acting.
These are excellent movies. A great find to add to your classic movie collection.. If you are a fan of Sidney Then this DVD is for you.
Each and every movie Sidney starred in had substance and meaning.  Great performers.  Three of the movies I had never seen.  Wonderful cast members too.

Got as a gift for my sister in law for Christmas. She had asked for the movie  "A Patch of Blue",it costs more to buy that movie separately. Saw this set of movies, and was very happy with the price. When she opened it at Christmas, she was more than pleased. The fact that it was done as a set by TCM is a bonus.
Can't beat Sidney Poitier's acting, and these films prove it. Exceptional.
